task.title: Test Segmentation Rules
task.shortdesc: Test whether the rules contained in an SRX file can be used to segment text as expected or not.

step.cmd: Click the Test Rules button () from the tool bar to display the Rules Testing dialog.
In the Sample Text box, type or paste text to segment.
Select the language of the sample text in the Source Language drop-down list.

taskbody.result: An HTML table with the sample text segmented according to the specified rules set is displayed in a new window.
